parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: True to show the selected component, false to hide it

title: IAssemblyDoc.SetComponentVisibility
description: Hides or shows the selected component in the specified configurations in this assembly document.

   System.Boolean
Visibility
,
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)
